item.description:
Designers of New Haven -

October's Meetup will be at the offices of Elements LLC (www.elementsdesign.com). Amy Graver, the founder and principal of Elements and a member of our group, will participate on a mini-panel about the business of design. I am looking for two more volunteers who have experience running a design business to join her.

The panel will take about 30-45 minutes, leaving plenty of time for mingling before and after. Light refreshments will be provided.

Wednesday, October 4
5.30pm - 7.30pm

Elements LLC
King's Block
20 Grand Avenue
New Haven, CT 06513
(Corner of Grand and Front along Quinnipiac River)

There is parking on-site accessible from Front Street.

I will be there and I hope that you can all make it too! Please RSVP so we can know how much food/drink to have.

David

ps - Sorry for the late notice, was working out arrangements and just super busy!

pps - Any volunteers for getting in on the Organizer thing?
item.name: Greater New Haven Design October Meetup
